Replies.Reply: Lizzy?
Lizzy. What are you doing here?
Your friend?
I scared him?
Lizzy?
Jesse!
Wake up, sleepy head. Time to wake up.
Me, too.
Promise.
I'll never let anyone hurt you.
Morning.
Mom! Don't call it that!
That's Jesse. Let's go, Lizzy.
I need an alarm clock.
Broke.
No. You were Jason.
Yes, ma'am?
My report is on Global Economic Trends.
I'm waiting to see if you're going to turn into Freddy.
Fear is real though, isn't it? And if nightmares are fear, then doesn't that make them real?!
And if the nightmares are real then is reality like a dream?!
No. She gave me last period off.
Jesse! I've been having nightmares for almost two weeks now and they keep getting worse! Now I'm having daymares! I want to know why!
That's a good idea. Why don't you cut last period and come with me?
The library.
Find anything?
Did you know that our sub-conscious retains everything that ever happened to us? Everything. From the time we're born until we die.
No?
Well, what? What is it?
Black Bart.
Duh. You put your quarter in and he says, "Go ahead and draw, tenderfoot."
No one can hit him -- it's a gyp.
What message?
The library.
Over to Stormie's.
She used to be in the Freddy cult.
I think he thinks Lizzy joined the cult or something.
I've got to find Lizzy myself. I've got to find her and save her from Freddy before that crazy cop kills her.
Murdoch said something about going to talk to somebody named Erwin.
Where is he?
I want you to stay here.
Shoot?
I don't do drugs.
No.
Freddy's cult kidnapped my sister.
How can he do that?
So the cult gets Lizzy pregnant?
Anything. Just name it.
How can you kill a dream?
Deal.
No! They'll never believe her!
We've got to do something!
Oh, my God -- she was here! This is part of Lizzy's shirt! It's all torn!
Except what?!
How?
What should we do?
What are they for?
Daddy?
But we've still got a chance, right?
Then let's get somebody else. Some-
We should pull over and ask directions.
It says, open all night.
What's the story on Jason Voorhees anyway?
I knew that. What I mean was why?
What happened to him then?
Why does he keep coming back to life and killing people?
I know! We'll sing a song!
It's Freddy!
Is he going to be okay?
Jesse!
Jesse! Wake up! Wake up!!
Jesse, wake up! WAKE UP!!
Do you think you and Stormie could keep him occupied for a few minutes?
It's kill him! Shut it off! Shut it off!
Jason! JASON! You've got to get up!
Who are you calling?!
Are you kidding?! They'll lock us up and throw away the key!
STOP!
That's right.
Now, I know that you've been through a lot. And I know that you're pissed off about being murdered and all.
We've got to try and stay awake.
What am I going to do? I'll never be able to find Lizzy now.
That's for being my best friend, Stormie.
Where are we going?
I'm okay, mom.
Sorry. Today has been a bitch.
A mental hospital.
There's no mistake.
What did you do with Erwin?
We're wasting time! We've got to close down all the churches --
Don't you understand?! He has to come to our reality to do it! It's our last chance to kill him!
Dad! Mom! Don't let them lock me up!
I did what I had to do to try and save Lizzy!
Liar! Freddy killed Jesse! He was already dead when I cut his heart out!
Goddamnit, you don't understand!
Stormie?!
Something just happened at the TV station.
What for?
Meagan.
Stop!
Take me, Freddy. Take me instead.
Oh, that's right -- tell everybody!
Kick his ass, Jason!
Jason! Get up! Get up!
Jason! You've got to get up!
What took you so long?!
Erwin? Erwin?!
NO!
No monsters here.
Then we'll just have to kick their ass again.
I love you too. Go to sleep.
Yes, dad?
Hello?
Playing with my friend.
He lives under the bed.
I had a bad dream.
I was scared.
Promise?
No, you are!
No, they didn't!
No they won't, because I'm walkin' home!
You forgot to check under the bed.
But what if they come back?
I love you, Meagan.
Where ya been all my death, baby?
I've been waitin' at the altar for a long, long time!
Looks like a photo opportunity to me!
Looking for some-body?
Stew on this, bitch!
Smokin'!
Shouldn't dream and drive.
Looks like the cat's out of the bag now!
Then maybe I'll just CUT to the chase!
Oh I'm so scared, honey. Come on!
Owwwww!
Now that's what I call getting a buzz.
That's for the lift sister!
Hiya, kids!
Ready to get hitched?
Then let's do it!
You're a virgin?!
Get her ready.
Oh, shit!
Are the bridesmaids in attendance?
Meagan!
Good morning! Hey, what's the matter?
Was I naked?
Was I any good?
So she said you were okay?
So you're going back to class?
Well, what are you bitching about?
Okay, Meg, go look it up. You've got the rest of the day off, that's all I'm saying.
Sure. Where are we going?
You want me to cut school so we can go to the library?
Really?
No.
Well, yeah.
You know about Black Bart?
That's just it -- I never could!
Scared the shit out of me.
Where are we going?
Stormie? I thought you and her weren't friends anymore since she stole that twenty dollars from you.
I still don't understand. What has she got to do with Lizzy missing?
I thought you were in the cult?
Why don't you just let the cops find her? That guy Renton Murdoch -- he knows how to deal with these cultist psychos. He was the man who got Jason Voorhees.
But even with his head hacked open and his brains leaking out, Murdoch still managed to put his last bullet in Jason's eye.
So what's different about him?
Just where are you going to look?
Not Squirmin' Erwin -- that freak that used to eat bugs?
A death hex?
Why?
Scare him?
No! I won't do it!
It's illegal! I could go to jail!
Oh, yeah? Why don't you call then?
And I'm not a wimp!
I need a quarter for the phone.
There's a bomb planted in your building.
If I were you -- I'd get my ass out of there.
He's not going to make it.
We could turn out like him!
What for?
This rusty chunk of shit? What good is this?
Will that work?
Jason?
Somehow I just knew you would.
But I damn sure don't want you to do it without me. Count me in.
Very funny.
Hey! Can we get some service out here?!
Stupid? Like what?
He came back from the grave?
How can you kill somebody who's back from the grave?
Duh?!
Well it ain't Raggedy Ann, bitch!

As the sun rises on yet another morning, still no end in sight for the standoff between police and the mysterious group known only as the "Freddy" cult who seized the abandoned house behind me just thirteen days ago.  These cultists -- mostly run-

Alleged child murderer Fred Krueger was released on a legal technicality but later burned to death at the hands of a vigilante mob of grieving parents.  Some years later, a rash of bizarre and unexplainable teen-
To the parents of Springwood --

I'm standing here with State Trooper Captain Renton Murdoch, the man the Governor has called in to deal with the cultists because of his past experience with occult-style murderers. In fact, Trooper Murdoch is the only law enforcement officer ever to survive a one-on-one encounter with notorious Camp Crystal Lake killer -- Jason Voorhees.
You received some pretty nasty injuries in your battle with Jason, didn't you, Captain?
What about these so called "Freddy"
No. Now that the Governor has given me complete authority to deal with these punks I should be putting an end to their situation pretty quick.
Is that shyster still in there trying to talk them out?
Freeze!
Looks like we'll have to hunt the rest of them down. Let's go before they get too far.
Leave her.
Forget it. I've seen this before.
You're wasting your time.
Punks.
I told you you were wasting your time. Once these kids go rabid, best thing to do is put 'em down.
Did you see a couple of girls go by here a moment ago?
Teenagers are notorious liars.
You did the right thing.
Did the guard say what they took?
Three!
Is that a fact?
I knew it!
Stand back! I'll handle this.
Let her go.
That'll teach you to fuck with the law, Voorhees!
Okay, I think we've heard enough of this crap. Take her back to the lockup.
Yeah, including murdering your boy-
Religious station? Is there a padre there?
So that's where they're hiding.
This is Captain Renton Murdoch --
Hand me that flare pistol.
Alright, now I'm through playing "nice guy" -- I want the rest of you punks to come out right now with your hands up.
What we're going to need then is somebody to charge their lines --
GO GIT 'EM, SON!
It's time I taught you girls some respect for the law!
Then die like a punk!
So, as I explained to you before, the revenues between the TV movie deal and the book sale should be adequate to fund your joint-defense.
Freddy lives!
It's hot.  Several of the kids fan themselves, struggling to stay awake while others have already passed out on their desks.  Meagan's eyes are heavy.
Meagan!?
I asked if you were ready to give your oral report?
Please come up here to the podium.
Louder, Meagan. We can't hear you.
Meagan? Meagan?!
I asked if you were ready to give your report?
Meagan? Can you hear me? Do you know where you are?
Are you sure?
Meagan?
You're stupid!
They forgot you again!
Yes, they forgot and you're goin' to wait out here until it's dark and then the monsters are goin' come and get you!
Come back, Lizzy! You can wait with me! I got forgot too, you know!
Looks like she was in the cult all along.
I know it's hard to believe, miss.
If I did know I would call the police, you know that. I love Lizzy.
Militant feminist, man-hating phase, what's it fuckin' to ya?!
Jason kicked his ass.

Well, one of my mom's boyfriends worked at the hospital where they took him. He said that Murdoch lost more than half his brain and what little that was left was all twisted up inside. And they had to replace his skull with a metal plate to keep that from leaking out.
They say he hasn't been the same since.
Erwin Kelper! He used to be in the Freddy cult! I bet he knows where they took Lizzy!
Who else?
He's talking about dream dope --
Chill, Erwin. We're here for some hard data -- not a floppy disk.
I told her you might know where they took her.
The whole cult? Yeech!
That's the stupidest shit I ever heard.
But Freddy's dead.
How will they ever know? Don't be such a pussy!
Okay, I will!
Hello, how do you do? My name is Jesse. I think I'm a man but I'm actually a wimp.
Oh, cool!
I've got him! Wake us up! Wake us up!
Don't just stand there! Wake us up!
Shoot him! Shoot him!
You didn't help me, you pussy!
Are you okay?
Yeah! We could hire somebody to kill Freddy -- like a hit man!
Sounds like our man!
Hey, we sisters have to stand together, right? Where you lead --
I don't think they're open.
We want to see it.
Been dug up a few times already, has he?
Where have you been? Jason was that guy who ran around in a hockey mask, chopping up camp counselors, duh?
She got her head chopped off by one of the girls she was trying to kill!
Get back, you nasty-ass bastard!
Well, that means we've all got to stay awake!
I'm staying with you.
How?
Hey doc, is there someplace I could get us something to eat?
Just missed 'em.
Where'd you get the truck?
And where's that?
What'd you do -- take him for a swim?
What's that supposed to mean?
Is this him?
Why'd you put that stupid mask on him?
Good idea.
So what do we do now -- sing an Ozzy Osbourne song backwards or something?
I thought you said you knew how to bring him back to life?
Hey! Watch that!
Just keep your hands above the bra, pizza face.
He's head right for her! Do some-
You've got to quit blaming your-
So you kick the bucket and Jason lives.
Just don't stand there! Do something!
The cops! Who else?!
Fine by me!
Damnit! It's dead!
You're the one who brought him back to life!
Well, do something!
Oh, some hero!
That's right! She gave you her boyfriend's heart, you know!
I know I would be!
Getting something to eat might help.
Yo, Butch!
Excuse me, Deputy Miller but could we have something to eat?
And I thought you pigs only ate donuts.
Cow! I hope she chokes on her three combo-burrito cud!
You should be worrying about your-
Help! Help! Freddy's here! He's here!
Oh, shit! I'm still asleep!

You don't scare me, Freddy! Thanks to my various phases and many hours of watching violent televison, I have become immune to violence. Seen it all and done it all! Nothing you do can gross me out -- so why don't you give it your best shot, bitch!
Who is this?
I'm talking to you, asshole!
SHOW ME YOUR ARMS! YOUR ARMS!
Where do you shoot?
You're not in the cult?
Didn't Freddy send you to kill me?
Well, what do you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
I already told the cops everything I know.
To bear his child. Freddy wants to be human again. In order to do that he has to be "reborn".
He has to marry a virgin on holy ground. Then the cult consumate the marriage by impregnating her.
Freddy's the son of a hundred maniacs.
And Freddy enters the soul of the fetus through a dream state. Voila!
I'll help you find your sister, but you've got to help me.
You have to help me kill Freddy.
If only in our dreams.
When it's not a dream.
Do we have a deal?
Hi, my name's Erwin. Thanks for busting me out of there!
Damn! We must have just missed them!
We could go after Freddy.
We'll inject ourselves with Dream Dope.  It's a mild narcotic that brings on a dreamlike state.
Don't worry about it. We need you wide awake anyway.
It's not the gun, it's what's in it -- silver bullets blessed by a priest.

It's how the cult keeps in constant contact with Freddy. The little lights flashing are a sustained occular input that causes your brain to resonate at approximately the same frequency at which the dream state is most likely to occur.
WHAT A RUSH, HUH?!!
Well, atleast you're not dead.
It means we've still got some time left. Until his remains are host to the Dream Demons -- Freddy can't hurt us.
We already tried that. There's no way for us to kill Freddy. He's too clever. He knows how to get to us.
Seriously dead. Buried up by Crystal Lake somewhere. But don't worry, I know how to bring him back to life.
No doubt about. Jason could wreck Freddy on this side of the Dreamline.
It started a long time ago, back in the fifties, when Jason drown at Camp Crystal Lake. His mother went berserk and started killing the counselors.
Right. And then Jason came back from his watery grave to get revenge.
Yeah. Chopped up a number of people before they finally caught up to him.
They killed him.
Not very well apparently. Jason keeps coming back to life and chopping people up. It's a never ending cycle of terror up here at Crystal Lake -- a real problem.

They say he's looking for revenge on the camp counselor who murdered him as a child. Jason just happens to go about it in the socially unacceptable way of hacking through every teenager he finds until he gets the right one.
Get it?!
We just dug up a rotting corpse and you're worried about a little snot.
I'll call you at the hospital.
Somehow!
Same place I've got Jason hid.
A place where no one ever goes.
Almost.
Is she going to be alright?
You're a strong woman.
Meet the new and improved Jason.
Not exactly a beauty queen entry, is he?
I do! But when I was putting him back together, I noticed something was missing.
That guard in there might pose a problem.
I'm just trying to make it look real.
As you can see, I've excavated the power cable that runs across the bottom of Crystal Lake. I've cut away the insulation, exposing a patch of cable right near the water's edge.
Now when I kick this over, the water will wash down the trench and bridge an eletrical gap between the cable and the lake. There's plenty of voltage, so it should work.
Holy shit! It worked!
Hey! Come back! I've got him locked up in the tool shed!
He's right behind me!
And?!
There's no one else inside.
Well why didn't you say so?! Jesus, for a minute there I thought you were going to kill me.
You're not, are you?
I'll drive.
Fuck the bitch. Let's roll!
I can't wake them up. Freddy's got them trapped!
Go get him, boy!
Oh, no! Freddy's in the transmitter!
He's going for the satellite dish!
No! Wait!
What's this? A funeral procession?
Yeah? Whose?
That's exactly what it is.
Yours.
We're here to see the Reverend Lovejoy. We need him to perform a wedding.
No. I have a Beretta.
Yes. But he needs a lot of rest.
I'm afraid the cafeteria is closed.
Attention. Would Meagan or Stormie please pick up the white paging phone for a message?
Stop right there!
Welcome aboard, son! I'm sure you'll have a great time!
Hey, look!
See what?
It's Deputy Miller.
I thought you psychos only ate human hearts?
Don't make me come back there.
Come on, Meagan.
Your parents are here.
Hi there! I'm the Boogerman! Heh-
Uh-oh, Freddy's picking his nose again -- gotta go!
Well, excuse me!
I'll go check it out. You stay here.
Fasten your safety belt, please.
This is Channel 12 -- Station W.G.O.D.
I won't do it! It's a sin!
And who would be the bride?
And the groom.
Hello. What can I do for you?
Do you have an appointment?
Don't worry about it -- get undressed.
Time to get you cleaned up for court.
What the hell is all the screaming about?!
We found your patrol car, Captain.
Yes, sir. Reverend Lovejoy broad-
Are you saying you want me now?
Prove it.
Now that's more like it!
Hey, this bitch is alright!
The bitch that died last night?
Hey, that's Captain Murdoch's car!
Hiya, Freddy!
Ready, Freddy!
Verrrrrry funny, Oswald!
Hey, have one now and save the other for the ride home. That's what I did.
It wasn't me!
HEY!
That's it, kiddo! You're really giving it to him out there! Use the left more -- jab! Make him hurt!
I don't think they're coming back.
